# string-slugify

Convert strings to slug

## Install

```bash
$ npm install string-slugify
```

```bash
$ component install alexeyraspopov/string-slugify
```

```bash
$ bower install string-slugify
```


## API

	slugify(string, options);

## Usage

	slugify('Hello world'); // 'hello-world'
